Name: Overload
Description: Playing cards with Overload INCREASES the amount of mana you'll have on your next turn, effectively acting as a buffer to allow mana boosting next turn.

Name: Menace
Description: Must be killed by 2 creatures; Fearful Presence.

Name: Silence
Description: Silencing a minion removes its card text and any enchantments, akin to Magic's removal of abilities with effects like Disenchant.

Name: Flying
Description: Creatures with flying cannot be attacked by other creatures without flying or reach.

Name: Flash
Description: Creatures with flash can be played any time you could play an instant.

Name: Scry
Description: See other player's hand.

Name: Vigilance
Description: Prevent Ambushes from laying in LOS.

Name: First Strike
Description: Creatures with first strike deal combat damage before creatures without first strike in the first strike combat damage step.

Name: Landspirit
Description: Creatures with basic-land-type-walk are unblockable if the defending player controls a land-of-basic-type.

Name: Taunt
Description: Like Wall creatures in Magic, minions with Taunt must be targeted by attacks before other minions or the hero.

Name: Inspired
Description: A condition that allows you to draw a new card every time you use a card, and continue for as long as there is available mana.

Name: Chronomancy
Description: When you play this card, exile it face down with a certain number of time counters onto the battlefield. During the sunrise phase of your turn, remove a time counter. When you remove the last counter, flip the card face-up.

Name: Quicksand
Description: Creatures attempting to move are dealt damage instead. This effect doesn't apply to creatures with flying or landspirit.

Name: Indestructible
Description: Creatures with indestructible cannot be destroyed by damage or effects that say "destroy."

Name: Adapt
Description: Allows you to choose a buff for a minion from some number of options.

Name: Divine Protection
Description: Similar to Divine Shield in Hearthstone or protection in Magic, Divine Protection allows a minion to ignore the first instance of damage dealt to it.

Name: Harvest
Description: When this creature dies, you may search your library for a card associated with it and put it onto the battlefield.

Name: Reach
Description: Creatures with reach can block creatures with flying.

Name: Deathtouch
Description: Any amount of damage dealt by a creature with deathtouch is enough to destroy another creature.

Name: Raise
Description: Return a creature back to living status.

Name: Regeneration
Description: Creatures with regeneration can be "regenerated" to prevent destruction from lethal damage or effects.

Name: Hexproof
Description: Creatures with hexproof cannot be the target of spells or abilities controlled by opponents.

Name: Trample
Description: Creatures with trample deal excess combat damage to the defending player or planeswalker after dealing lethal damage to blocking creatures.

Name: Haste
Description: Creatures with haste can attack or use abilities with the tap symbol immediately on the turn they enter the battlefield.

Name: Wall
Description: Creatures with wall cannot attack, only defend.
